Package com.financial.services.expenses

package com.financial.services.expenses
Provides specialized services and logic for managing budget expenses at the entity and service levels.

This package handles the "heavy lifting" of the expenditure side, including:

  • Hierarchical Logic: Navigating and aggregating data from Services up to Entities via EntityLogicService.
  • State Management: Tracking modification history and providing undo capabilities through ExpensesHistory.
  • Strategic Adjustments: Executing complex budget changes using the Strategy design pattern via BudgetExpenseChangesService.
  • Abstraction: Defining the core financial contracts for organizational units through the EntityLogic interface.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.financial.services
    The central service layer of the application, orchestrating financial logic across all budget sectors.
    com.financial.services.revenues
    Provides specialized services and interfaces for managing budget revenue logic, amount modifications, and state history.
  • Class
    Description
    BudgetExpenseChangesService
    Utility service that orchestrates mass budget adjustments by selecting and executing the appropriate ExpenseAdjustmentStrategy.
    BudgetExpenseLogicService
    Utility service providing stateless logic for filtering, searching, and aggregating BudgetExpense data.
    EntityLogic
    Defines the comprehensive financial logic contract for an organizational entity.
    EntityLogicService
    Utility service that provides stateless logic for grouping, filtering, and aggregating expenses specifically focused on organizational entities and services.
    ExpensesHistory
    Manages the state history of budget expenses, providing undo (revert) capabilities using a LIFO stack mechanism.
